parameters.name: numOfItemsToBeDisplayed
parameters.label: Number of images to be displayed at once

parameters.name: numOfImgToGet
parameters.label: Number of most recent images to aquire(maximum 33)

parameters.name: timeTillTransition
parameters.label: Time delay between each move in secounds

parameters.name: backgroundColour
parameters.label: Can give in colour code or colour name. Example: #F5F5DC or beige

parameters.name: paginationSpeed
parameters.label: Time taken of photo tranistions in seconds

parameters.name: refreshInterval
parameters.label: Time interval to check for new photos in minutes(minimum 15)

parameters.name: showCaption
parameters.label: Show image caption (not possible for 1 or more than 6 images being displayed at a time) - NOTE: still in testing

parameters.name: captionColour
parameters.label: Caption colour. Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: captionlengthPercentage
parameters.label: The percentage of text to be displayed until ellipsis(Between 0-100)
